ARABIC: وَتِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُورِثْتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is the Garden you will inherit for what you did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is the Paradise you will inherit (as meed) for your deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such is the Paradise that you shall inherit by virtue of your good deeds in the life of the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the Paradise which you have received as your inheritance by virtue of what you have done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And this is the Paradise which is bequeathed to you, because of your deeds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is the Paradise, which you have been made to inherit because of your deeds that you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And this is the garden which you are given as an inheritance on account of what you did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is the Paradise that you have been given for an inheritance for the things that you were doing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is the Garden which ye are made to inherit because of what ye used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: this is the Garden which you will inherit by virtue of your past deeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is the Garden which ye have been made to inherit for that which ye have been working.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is the paradise you have been given to inherit for what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such will be the Garden of which ye are made heirs for your (good) deeds (in life).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is the Paradise which you have been made to inherit because of your deeds which you used to do (in the life of the world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such is the Paradise you shall inherit, for the things you did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Such is the Garden you are made to inherit, because of what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:72]   And that is the Paradise which you have been given to inherit [as the reward] for what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is the Garden which ye are made to inherit) this is Paradise in which you are made to dwell, you inherited it (because of what ye used to do) and say in the life of the world.
